T02D2060:155a-1: ma no ha ri s'a dha nam /
T02D2060:155a-4: de nas mi'am ci'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya ste /
T02D2060:155a-5: aom ma no ha ri sv'a h'a /
T02D2060:155a-7: sngar gyi tshogs byas pa'i gshin rje gshed kyi rnal
T02D2060:155a-8: 'byor pas ri'i rtse mor stong phrag brgyad bzlas te
T02D2060:155a-9: / de'i rjes la mchod pa chen po byas te /
T02D2060:155a-10: ba'i sha dang gu gul bsres pa'i bdug spos btang zhing /
T02D2060:155a-11: ji srid ma byung ba de srid gyi bar du
T02D2060:155a-12: bzlas pas de nas nam phyed kyi dus su mi
T02D2060:155a-13: 'am ci'i bu mo de rang 'ong bar 'gyur ro
T02D2060:155a-15: sgrub pa po khyed kyis bdag la bka' bsgo ba mdzad du gsol zhes zer na /
T02D2060:155a-16: bzang mo khyod bdag gi chung ma gyis shig ces brjod do //
T02D2060:155a-17: de nas rgyab tu khur nas lha'i 'jig rten du khyer te /
T02D2060:155a-18: de nas yang rang gi gnas su skyel lo //
T02D2060:155a-19: lha'i 'dod pa'i rdzas kyang ster ro //
